stories.original_summary: For decades, scientists have believed that complex life began when two very different microbes joined forces, eventually giving rise to plants, animals, and fungi. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Ancient Secret of Life's Beginning!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a profound secret about the dawn of all living things. They discovered how tiny, unseen sprites, some needing vital breath and others not, first joined forces. This ancient alliance eventually gave rise to all creatures and plants in our world.

stories.fantasy_headline: Seek the Finest Enchanted Tome for Your Studies!
stories.fantasy_story: Travelers often carry a scrying mirror for tales, but a true scholar knows the worth of an enchanted tome. These magical books hold an entire grand archive within their covers, freeing your eyes from strain. Many even glow softly with runes, allowing reading in the deepest dungeon or darkest night.

stories.fantasy_headline: Esteemed Leaders Depart the Grand Guild of Micrasoft's Scrollworks.
stories.fantasy_story: After many seasons of service, the revered Guild Masters, Philus Spencius and Serah Bond, are stepping down from their posts. They guided the Grand Guild of Micrasoft's Emerald Scrollworks to great success. The guild's leader announced their honorable departure from these vital roles.
